name: Sort Home Fast (1HGJ 268)
description:
Game made in 1 hour for 1HGJ 268 under the theme "Home" https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=268

You must sort everything within the time limit! (Displayed on the left of the player.) The right number is movements. Black & White are solids, Purple is the player.

Controls: Arrow keys to move and space to drop current items.
